data.meta_site_name: John Gordon Obituary | February 21, 2023 | Lewis M. Hunt-Irving Funeral Home Inc. - Chester, PA
data.text:
HIS LIFE STORY

John Leroy Gordon was born in Chester pa on March 13th 1969.

Some of you may have known him as "Jaz" or "g". Born to the late John Davis and the late Vivian Gordon. He returned to God on February 21, 2023 surrounded by love ones.

John leaves behind two sisters, Marie Gordon and Amber Moses, 2 brothers Darren Gordon Sr. (Danielle), Umar Gordon (Kim), and the late William Corbin and Jujuan Gordon. John was educated in the Chester Upland School System. He formerly coached the lets football team of Aston Pa and won several games he also worked in landscaping and for Gordon Enterprise.

John also leaves to honor his memory children: Schenita Gordon, Johnesha Gordon, John Gordon, Siani Gordon, Kijana Gordon and Darryl Davis*, thirteen grandchildren. Fiance Delise Mumford and a host of aunts, uncles, nieces and nephews whom he admired.

John was a stern man and big on respect. He preached it every chance he got. He was family oriented, enjoyed being around family and friends. Talking about the good times. A nature born comedian. He embraced the room with laughter every time he walked in, you was for sure to know it was about to be a good time. A ball of energy who enjoyed life and never took a day for granted. Knowing him was to know he was a devoted Dallas Cowboys fan who enjoyed watching his boys play.

Grace, Respect, Gratitude Family, Friends and Football was his symbol
